title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Tony's dad Edward arrives and causes quite the stir
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Hollyoaks gets a new arrival in upcoming episodes, as Tony Hutchinson’s (Nick Pickard) dad Edward (Joe McGann) arrives in Chester — and upon said arrival — he wastes little time in causing quite the stir amongst some of the villagers!

With news of Harry’s (Parry Glasspool) death well and truly out, Diane (Alex Fletcher) is forced to arrange the funeral, after the police inform her that the young man’s body is ready for release. Marnie (Lysette Anthony) supports her in regards to the funeral arrangements, and they’re both left stunned when Tony’s dad, Edward turns up without any notice. As a result, Diane wastes little time in sending him packing.

However, Edward’s not one for giving up, and thus he turns up once more the following day — and Finn (Keith Rice) grows rather suspicious of him — but he simply claims that he wants to help in Tony’s absence, and begs Diane to give him a chance. Later, at The Dog, Marnie and Cindy (Stephanie Waring) are smitten when Edward enters.

Determined to prove himself, Edward comes up with a plan to help Diane when she says that she needs time to be herself again, and thus he arranges for Nancy (Jessica Fox), Mandy (Sarah Jayne Dunn), Darren (Ashley Taylor Dawson) and Cindy to come round to the flat so that she can have some adult company for the evening.

Later, Luke (Gary Lucy) arrives and clashes with Edward. What’s more, Edward undermines Finn on a number of occasions too, so it’s clear that he’s a force to be reckoned with.

Yes, it doesn’t take long for Edward to get his feet under the table, and before long he makes quite the impression on everyone.

The question is: is Edward simply there to help out in Tony’s absence? Or is there a more sinister reason for his presence in the village?

We’ll have to wait and see.

One to watch: Friday 18th October at 7pm on E4.
